Package com.moback.android

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BasicCompletionBlock
    When performing generic async network calls, this completion block is used to return the status of the call.
    BooleanCompletionBlock
    This provides a callback that will be used when performing async calls that return boolean results.
    DownloadCompletionBlock
    When performing file downloads via NetworkDownloadTask, this is used to return the status of the async operation.
    FetchCountCompletionBlock
    This completion block is used when querying MoBack for the number of entries in a given table.
    FetchMultipleCompletionBlock
    When making async queries for multiple MoBackObjects, this completion block is used to return the downloaded objects, as well as the status of the network operation.
    FetchSingleCompletionBlock
    When making async queries for a single MoBackObject, this completion block is used to return the downloaded/cached object, as well as the status of the operation.
    FilesCompletionBlock Deprecated
    MoBackImageLoader.MoBackImageListener
    Interface for the MoBackImageView and MoBackImageLoader callback
    MoBackImageView.MoBackResponseObserver
    We may need an observer for this later.
    Networking.NetworkCallback
    This interface is used only with methods in Networking that require a callback for returning data.
    Progress
    For asynchronous tasks that have progress updates, this provides an interface to update your state, perhaps via a progress bar, when the task has some updated state.
    UploadCompletionBlock
    This interface is for the callback used when the file has finished uploading.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileManager
    The FileManager exposes helper methods for initiating the upload and download of files.
    GcmBroadcastReceiver
    This receiver needs to be set in your Manifest to receive data from the GCM servers, regarding any push notifications that have been sent.
    MoBack
    The interface provided in thie class exposes methods for setting app instance specific data.
    MoBackFile
    This class represents an internal file object on the MoBack cloud.
    MoBackGeoPoint
    This holds the Java representation of the GeoPoint object.
    MoBackImageLoader
    Contains the network task to retrieve the image Contains the cache for images Contains the listener for MoBackImageView calls Tightly coupled with RCImageView
    MoBackImageLoader.MoBackImageCache
    Contains the ImageCache for the RCImageLoader
    MoBackImageView
    Based off VolleyImageView Tightly coupled with MoBackImageLoader
    MoBackObject
    This class is to be extended to contain any extra data types that are part of your corresponding MoBack table.
    MoBackQuery
    To select specific MoBackObejcts, you can use this class to build up a query for your needs.
    MoBackReceiver  
    MoBackStatus
    This class encapsulates the status code and message returned from the REST API calls made internally.
    MoBackUser  
    NetworkDownloadTask
    Note, when using this class you need to have the permission: android.permission.WAKE_LOCK Because it allows a maintained download in case the device sleeps, etc.
    Networking
    This class provides the interface for making API calls.
    NetworkRequestTask
    This async task performs all of the API calls, given the input data needed for those calls.
    NetworkUploadTask
    Note, when using this class you need to have the permission: android.permission.WAKE_LOCK Because it allows a maintained upload in case the device sleeps, etc.
    NotificationService
    This class provides an interface used to enable the receiving of MoBack Push Notifications.
    SSOManager
    This class provides an interface for single sign-on of users, as well as their registration with MoBack.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MoBackQuery.Order
    The direction of sorting values returned by the object query.
    Networking.CacheType
    The cache style to use with the network calls
    Networking.RequestType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidAppKeyException
    This exception is thrown if you have specified an empty App ID, or haven't specified any ID.
    InvalidEnvironmentKeyException
    This exception is thrown if you have specified an empty App Environment Key, or haven't specified one at all.
    UserException
    This exception is thrown if there's no logged in user, and it's immediately required that there be one.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    MoBackTableName
    This annotation, when used on a class that extends MoBackObject, will change the table name that is used to save/load object data.
